docs.text: H&H Food Cost of food in silver = (MaxStat 2 or MaxStat 3 + OtherStats) /10 /Hunger if MaxStat is +2 then MaxStat *3 else MaxStat *2 end Strength Meat-in-Jelly Cauldron (Porkboll, Dill or Laurel) Midnight Blue Onion Skewer (Yellowonion, Porkboll, Cowsmilk) Pumpkin Stew (Porkboll, Sage or Thyme Meatpie (Porkboll, Millet, Dill) Marrow Roast (Bone, Pork) Cave Cheddar Musky Milben Cucumber Salsa Cauldron (Stingingnettle) Jotun's Morsel (Laurel, Pork, Mixedmilk) Autumn Steak (Boar or Venison or Moose, Lettuce, Any) Onion Skewer (Redonion, Bear or Mammoth, Cowsmilk) Honey'd Bear fire (Laurel, Sheepsmilk or Mixedmilk) Lynxalami (Pork) Fishballs (Caveanger, Wheat, Leek or Redonion, Laurel) Nutjerky (Pork or any balls) Agility Hop Jellies cauldron (Honey, Slime, Chives) Oscypki Poultry Pot Pie hand (Carrot, Peapod, Wheat, Chicken) Autumn Steak (Otter, Lettuce, Trollmushrooms, Kvann or Laurel) Chewy Chevon fire (Goat or Wildgoat, Turnip, Kvann or Laurel) Tuber Mash churn (Beetroot, Goatsmilk, Chives) Apple Pie (Cowsmilk, Wheat) Glazed Honeyons (Yellowonion) Jotun's Morsel fire (Cowsmilk, Chives, Venison or Bat) Mushroom & Onion Pirozhki (Yellowonion, Cavelantern, Wheat) Badger Botillo Lamb & Lynx (Mutton) Moodog (Moose, Beef or Wildbeef) Honey Gruel Cauldron (any crop seeds) Intellegence Jorbonzola Beaver Delights Strawberries in Cream (Mixedmilk) Perched Perch (Redonion) Baked Birchbark Bream (Redonion, Peapod) Autumn Steak (Lettuce, Lynx, Bloatedbolete, Laurel) Autumn Steak (Lettuce, Ptarmigan, Cavelantern) Onion Skewer (Moose, Cowsmilk, Yellowonion) 4 Musky Milben Tuber Mash churn (Turnip, Mixedmilk, Laurel) 4 Mushroom Pie (Cavelantern, Wheat) Fruit Sorbet (any berry or any fruit, Snow) Jotun's Morsel fire (Pork, Cowsmilk, Kvann) 5 Perception Autumn Steak (Pork, Bloatedbolete, Heartwood, Kvann) Shepherd's Pie hand (Turnip, Anymilk, Chives, Yellowonion, Wheat, Kvann) Gevrik Majorero Strawberry Cake hand (Mixedmilk, Wheat) Autumn Steak (Pork, Bloatedbolete, Beetrootleaves, Kvann) Dried Filet of Cavelacanth Stinging Salad (Beetroot, Beetrootleaves, Stingingnettle) Butter-Chived Trout (Goatsmilk or Anymilk) Haggis (Leek, Mutton, Wheat) Grub Pie (Barley or Millet) Carrot Cake hand (Cowsmilk, Wheat) Encumbered Roast (Cucumber, any home animals or Boar) Charisma Sunlit Stilton Dressed Lettuce Clambake (Crab, any Fish, Mussel) Dexterity Garrotxa Creamy Cock (Peapod, Goatsmilk, Goatsmilk) Autumn Steak (Pork, Morels, Lettuce) Moules Frites cauldron (Mussel, Beetroot or Turnip, NoSpices) Moules Frites cauldron (Mussel, Beetroot, Laurel) Broiled Burbot (Laurel, Lettuce) Meatpie (Greyseal, Barley, Pepper) Autumn Steak (Mammoth, Lettuce, Cavelantern) Autumn Steak (Quail, Lettuce, Marshmallow or Cavelantern) Onion Skewer (Quail, Cowsmilk, Redonion or Leek) Roast Roach Wrap (Sage) Swan Neck (Lettuce) Mushroom & Onion Pirozhki (Bloatedbolete, Yellowonion, Wheat) Glazed Grazer Dog (Horse or Wildhorse) Chicken Chorizo (Mutton) Liver and Onions (Entrails, ???) Will Strawberries in Cream (Mixedmilk or Goatsmilk) Formaela Wonderful Wilderness Wurst Zesty Brill (Redonion) Black Ribeye Steak (Beef) Dream Cookies hand (Millet or Wheat) Two-Bird Skewer (Chicken, Turnip) Buttered Leeks (Leek, Any) Sweet Beets cauldron (Beetroot) Psyche Autumn Steak (Pork or Porkboll, Lettuce, Trollmushrooms) Moules Frites cauldron (Mussel, Cavebulb, Pepper) Butter-steamed Cavebulb (Mixedmilk) Everything Shepherd's Pie hand (Sheepsmilk, Leek, Beetroot, Wheat, Chives) Seal Burger (Wheat, Heartwood) Fruit Pie (Wheat, Grapes or Quince or Strawberries, Anymilk) Onion Salad (Leek, Turnip or Carrot) Fishwrap (any fish, any berries)

docs.text: Gilding The cost of item in silver = main stats * 2 + additional stats. Farmer Farming, Cooking, Perception, Dexterity Chef's Pin Hemp Fibre Finery Feather Trinket Cornbraid Heartwood Leaves Tailor Sewing, Dexterity, Charisma Scientist Intelligence, Learning Ability Lumberjack Carpentry, Lore Miner Strength, Masonry Blacksmith Strength, Smithing, Lore, Psyche, Will Plumb-Bob Blacksmith's Bauble Copper Scales Metal Buttons Bear Tooth Scout Exploration, Survival, Perception Fighter Armor, Agility, Strength, Melee Combat, Stealth

docs.title: By farmer

docs.text: H&H - заметки Задачи Искать океан Искать горы поблизости Искать кристаллы в горах Кредо Forager Farmer Tailor Quarryman Miner Fisherman Hunter Nomad Cook Цены Общие 1g = 10s Bar of Cast Iron = 1g Bar of Silver = 50s 1kg Pepper = 2g Salt = 5-10g (7g) Pearl = 5-10g (7g) Silk Fragment x10 = 1.5g Silk Cocon x5 = 1.5g Silk Thread = 1.5g Silk Cloth = 15g Заметки Красивые постройки: Оранжевый: Cork Oak + Iron Ochre + Copper Голубой: Silver Fir + Kyanite + Wrought Iron Зелёный: Mayflower + Zinscpar + Tin Радиус опоры гриба - 9 тайлов. Не изучай курьёзы, дающие лп/ч меньше их ментального веса * 30 за клетку. При интеллекте 150+ не изучай курьёзы, дающие лп/ч меньше 300 за клетку. Пиявка наносит за 3 укуса урон, примерно равный её качеству.
docs.title: H&H - заметки

docs.text: Искать океан Искать горы поблизости Искать кристаллы в горах Кредо Forager Farmer Tailor Quarryman Miner Fisherman Hunter Nomad Cook
docs.title: Задачи

docs.text: 1g = 10s Bar of Cast Iron = 1g Bar of Silver = 50s 1kg Pepper = 2g Salt = 5-10g (7g) Pearl = 5-10g (7g) Silk Fragment x10 = 1.5g Silk Cocon x5 = 1.5g Silk Thread = 1.5g Silk Cloth = 15g
docs.title: Общие

docs.text: Красивые постройки: Оранжевый: Cork Oak + Iron Ochre + Copper Голубой: Silver Fir + Kyanite + Wrought Iron Зелёный: Mayflower + Zinscpar + Tin Радиус опоры гриба - 9 тайлов. Не изучай курьёзы, дающие лп/ч меньше их ментального веса * 30 за клетку. При интеллекте 150+ не изучай курьёзы, дающие лп/ч меньше 300 за клетку. Пиявка наносит за 3 укуса урон, примерно равный её качеству.
docs.title: Заметки
